question: The Kisan Credit Card scheme is being implemented in all the States and Union Territories by____?
option2: All commercial banks, Regional Rural Banks & State co-operative banks
option3: all commercial banks, Regional Rural Banks, state co-operative banks, central co-operative banks, and primary agricultural co-operative societies
answer: all commercial banks, Regional Rural Banks, state co-operative banks, central co-operative banks, and primary agricultural co-operative societies
